title: Treasures from the land: the crafts of New Zealand
creator_credit: George Andrews and George Andrews Productions
brief_description: Introduces New Zealand crafts which are bsed on cultural heritage, and for which materials are obtained from the environment. Narrated by Lisa Harrow.
